message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.DS 

This paper deals with the problem of optimal control in POMDPs, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The focus on reactive policies and selective attention suggests a connection to robotics (cs.RO) and control systems (cs.SY). The mention of period doubling bifurcations and chaos suggests a connection to dynamical systems (cs.DS).
